Row.Text: Trelleborg: Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Stave Church and Longhouse in the same District. One Free wall on the start of a Celebration.
One Free wall on the start of a Celebration.

+5[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Restores movement to any Viking Unit at its location. Viking Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Coast or Navigable River.

Restores movement to any Viking Unit at its location. Viking Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Coast or Navigable River.
Unique Happiness Building. Grants a Great Work Slot. Additional Happiness for each adjacent Forest and Taiga Tile.
Stave Church Unique Culture Building. Ageless.
Unique Culture Building. Created by constructing the Nausts and Gristmill in the same District Receive a free Infantry Unit when entering a Celebration.
Longhouse: Unique Culture Building. Receive a free Infantry Unit when entering a Celebration.
